author: BBC Earth
description:
In the Kalahari Desert, these ostrich chicks won't survive much more than another day without water. With none in sight, how will their parents conjure up a drink for their thirsty offspring?

This clip is taken from 'Africa' (2013)
This is an epic journey through five diverse regions of an amazing continent, moving seamlessly from the wild terrain of extraordinary landscapes to intimate encounters with its mesmerising creatures. This is Africa as you've never seen it before.

Welcome to BBC EARTH! The world is an amazing place full of stories, beauty and natural wonder. Her
title: Baby Ostriches try to Survive Desert Heat | Narrated by David Attenborough | Africa | BBC Earth
